column2: No new Imperial Titular Titles will be available.
Both Kingdom and Empire ranked Titular Titles will be available.
Only the new Empire ranked Titles will be available.

In 1110 IC, the last Elector Count of Drakwald was slain by Deathmaster Slike, and over the next centuries Drakwald was left unsupported and many of our settlements were destroyed by Beastmen and Greenskins. After this in 1414 IC, the province was divided between Middenland and Nordland. If we can unite Drakwald, and bring it to it's old glory, we will be given Imperial recognition.
This will reform the De Jure County of Drakwald and make it your primary title. You'll also receive §YBeast Slayer§!, the ancient sword of it's Elector Count.

In 1707 IC, The Empire was devastated by a great Waaagh, and our last Elector Count was killed. Wissenland, taking adavtage of our weakness, annexed our lands. If we can take back our old lands, we can show the rest of the Empire that Sollanders are not weak, and receive the same privileges that the other Counts receive.
This will reform the De Jure County of Solland and make it your primary title. You'll also receive §YGrudge Settler§!, the ancient sword of it's Elector Count.

After many centuries of Beastmen and Goblin raids, defeats, deaths and turned backs, Drakwald was forgotten by so many, its land carved up and devided, its towns and villages abandoned. Since 1110 IC non-existing, but finally after so much time the Empire province of Drakwald has finally been restored to its former glory days. Glory that ended long time ago with the death of Count Vilner.
column14: x#event you get after reforming drakwald

column2: May Morr rest him, I shall continue the legacy!

After many centuries of Beastmen and Goblin raids, defeats, deaths and turned backs, Drakwald was forgotten by so many, its land carved up and devided, its towns and villages abandoned. Since 1110 IC non-existing, but finally after so much time the Empire province of Drakwald has finally been restored to its former glory days. Glory that ended long time ago with the death of Count Vilner.
column14: x#event that everyone gets after you reforming drakwald

column2: The Empire Province of Solland after being ravaged by a WAAAGH in 1707 IC and their Elector Count Eldred slain, Morr rest him, has become nothing more than a bookmark in tomes of history, pityed and mourned. Descendents of the WAAAGH survivours are only able to dream of their lost legacy, but now they can finally claim it back. Solland stands once more!
column14: x#event you get after reforming solland
